basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Mathematics and Statistics Major Undergraduate or graduate student 2.9 GPA or above Must be enrolled in a minimum of 6 hours per semester Two faculty recommendations
